00013     cerr<<"usage: "<<me<<" namespace type name"<<endl;

00016 int main(int ac, char **av) {
00017     try {
00018             if(ac!=4) {
00019                     usage(*av);
00020                     return 1;
00021             }
00022         
00023             string ac_conf("auto/");
00024             ac_conf+=av[3];
00025             ac_conf+=".cc";
00026             
00027             ofstream out(ac_conf.c_str(), ios::trunc);
00028             out<<"// file autogenerated, don't edit!"<<endl
00029                 <<"#include \"../cconf.h\""<<endl
00030                 <<"namespace "<<av[1]<<" {"<<endl
00031                 <<"\t"<<av[2]<<" ac_"<<av[3]<<"(\""<<conf_home
00032                 <<"/etc/vqwww/"<<av[3]<<"\");"<<endl
00033                 <<"}"<<endl;
00034 
00035             out.close();
00036             if(! out) {
00037                 cerr<<"can't write: "<<ac_conf<<": "<<strerror(errno)<<endl;
00038                 return 1;
00039             }
00040     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00041             cerr<<"exception: "<<e.what()<<endl;
00042             return 1;
00043     }
00044     return 0;
00045 }
